correctness.rationale: Largely non-compliant and weakly grounded. Numerous schema violations and unsupported assumptions are present: (1) Many required numeric fields are null/None, which violates the schema’s number type and the no-empty-values rule (e.g., processParameters.pressure.quantityValue.numericValue; thicknessControl.growthPerCycle.values[*].value.numericValue; nucleationPeriod.numericValue; dosingTime/purgeTime/flowRates numericValues; supercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles[*].count.numericValue; materialProperties.uniformity.variation, conformality.aspectRatio, filmComposition.elementalConcentration.values, optical/electrical property numericValues, roughness.value, filmDensity.value; deviceProperties.onOffRatio). (2) plasmaPower is set to null even though it is an optional object; including it as null violates the schema. (3) ReactantSelection uses placeholders (“Not Found”) for all precursors and for carrier/purging gases and assumes H2O co-reactant for InOx/GaOx/ZnO without textual support; the article does not report the IGZO ALD oxidant. (4) Deposition temperature is set to 350 °C, but the article only states the overall thermal budget < 350 °C; the actual IGZO ALD temperature is not provided—this is incorrect. (5) numberofCycles=10 and supercycle design details (sequence, counts) are not reported in the article; counts are missing (null) and the sequence is unsubstantiated. (6) Several properties assert facts not in the text (saturation=True, filmStability=True, reproducibility=True). (7) While some device metrics match the article (SS 61.7 mV/dec, μ_FE 16.9 cm^2/V·s, V_TH 0.68 V; deviceStructure bottom-gate; substrate matches), the pervasive missing/placeholder/null values and incorrect/assumed parameters render the process incoherent and not traceable. Corrections needed: remove nulls and placeholders; only include properties with values grounded in the text; do not assume co-reactants/precursors or temperatures; correct or omit plasmaPower; provide valid numeric values for required fields or omit optional sections; align supercycle details strictly to reported information.

completeness.rationale: Largely incomplete and non‑compliant with the schema and article. Key issues: (1) Multiple processes described in the article (different gate dielectrics HfOx/HfAlOx/AlOx, IGZO channels with different In ratios, SiO2 passivation; AlOx grown with H2O vs O3; various post‑treatments N2/O2/F) are collapsed into a single process. Separate process instances are required for each distinct ALD deposition (at minimum IGZO and each GI variant, plus SiO2). (2) Schema violations and placeholders: many required numeric fields are null or filled with “Not Found” (e.g., reactantSelection.carrierGas, purgingGas; processParameters.pressure, growthPerCycle values, dosingTime/purgeTime/flowRates numeric values; supercycleDesign.count numeric values; materialProperties.uniformity/conformality/roughness/filmDensity numeric values; deviceProperties.onOffRatio). The schema requires valid values with QUDT units and no empty/null entries. (3) Factual inconsistencies: deposition temperature set to 350 °C is not reported; 350 °C only refers to overall thermal budget. Co‑reactant H2O is assigned to InOx/GaOx/ZnO without evidence; the H2O vs O3 detail in the article pertains to AlOx gate dielectrics, not IGZO. Number of cycles (10) is not reported. Saturation=True is unsubstantiated. (4) Missing critical details for IGZO ALD: IGZO precursors (In, Ga, Zn) not reported (set as “Not Found”); supercycle design (a:b:c subcycle counts controlling composition) absent; growth‑per‑cycle and film growth control parameters missing; reactor details missing. (5) Material properties are largely empty or ungrounded: atomic ratios and elemental concentrations not provided; uniformity/conformality metrics missing; crystallinity marked amorphous without explicit citation; roughness and density absent. (6) Device properties: some values correctly captured (μ_FE=16.9 cm²/V·s, SS=61.7 mV/dec, V_TH=0.68 V), but on/off ratio missing and included with null instead of omitting. To improve, add distinct processes for each ALD film (IGZO, HfOx, HfAlOx, AlOx with H2O/O3, SiO2) and populate schema‑required fields with article‑grounded values only; include IGZO supercycle a:b:c counts, verified reactants/co‑reactants, valid deposition temperatures/pressures, and remove all null/placeholder entries or supply traceable numeric values.
